price: 95 Ceux qui l’entouraient dirent : « Par Allah ! Tu persistes dans la même erreur. »
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
